content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 58, "index": 11}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 17}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 55, "index": 20}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 17, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a smooth_quartz_slab, I need to first craft 4 smooth_quartz. To craft smooth_quartz, I need to smelt a quartz_block at slot 17 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 17 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 58, "index": 11}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 17}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 55, "index": 20}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 17, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted 1 smooth_quartz, but I need to craft 3 more. I will smelt another quartz_block from slot 17 into an empty slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 17 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 58, "index": 11}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 55, "index": 20}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 17, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted 2 smooth_quartz, but I need to craft 2 more. I will smelt another quartz_block from slot 17 into an empty slot (eg., 14).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 17 to slot 14 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 58, "index": 11}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 55, "index": 20}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 17, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted 3 smooth_quartz, but I need to craft 1 more. To craft the last smooth_quartz, I will smelt the remaining quartz_block from slot 17 into an empty slot (eg., 15).
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 58, "index": 11}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 5, "index": 19}, {"type": "crimson_fence_gate", "quantity": 55, "index": 20}, {"type": "cave_spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 25}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 17, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 8, "index": 45}]

thought: Now that I have crafted 4 smooth_quartz, I can craft the smooth_quartz_slab. To craft the smooth_quartz_slab, I need to place 3 smooth_quartz in a row in the crafting grid. I will move the smooth_quartz from slot 13 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 2 with quantity 1
